CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1958, pg. 1 reads: "Republicans Urge Equal Rights for All Citizens in Campaign Platform for '58 - Iron Out Details - W. Stuart Helm, Speaker of the House of Representatives, left, and George I. Bloom, chairman of the Republican State Committee, went into a huddle last Saturday morning before the state committee opened, and worked out details for conduction the session." Portion of accompanying article reads: "The Republican State Committee met at Hotel Webster Hall last Saturday morning and adopted a campaign platform pledging equal rights for all Pennsylvania citizens in fields of education, employment, organized labor and housing..."
TitMainTitle: W. Stuart Helm and George I. Bloom, standing at podium in Webster Hall for Republican State Committee meeting
